official_title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to permit the use of housing vouchers to assist lower income families affected by the prepayment of mortgages on projects subsidized by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.

summary.text: Voucher Assistance Improvement Act of 1988 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to permit the use of housing vouchers to assist lower income families affected by the prepayment of mortgages on Department of Housing and Urban Development projects.

titles.title: A bill to amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to permit the use of housing vouchers to assist lower income families affected by the prepayment of mortgages on projects subsidized by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.
